articles.description: Game 11 of the ongoing Women’s Premier League (WPL 2024) featured a clash between Royal Challengers Bangalore women and UP Warriorz women at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bangalore, on Monday, March 4.
articles.content: Game 11 of the ongoing Womens Premier League (WPL 2024) featured a clash between Royal Challengers Bangalore women and UP Warriorz women at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bangalore, on Monday, March 4.… [+1837 chars]
